concept.title: About user accounts
concept.shortdesc: There are two types of accounts: administrator and user.

conbody.p: Reviewer administrators are responsible for managing the system and its user accounts. Their main responsibilities are adding users to the system, enabling/disabling existing users, updating user information, and creating other administrators.
Reviewer users are authorized to use , but do not have administrator privileges.
conbody.note: You do not have to be an administrator to start a document review project.
